entry.title: Sweet Critters / Mignons Minois - Bear and Owls
entry.summary:
Vendor: ScriptDesigns
Type: HTV Ready Made Decals
Price: 3.25 - 13.75 (6 variants)

Transform a plain onesie, bib, t-shirt or pillow cover into something unique with our ready to apply HTV decals. 

Do you need ideas to decorate a nursery? You could use a decal as the starting point.  These decals are also available in matte adhesive vinyl for wall applications.

Custom sizes available upon request.

Our decals are printed professionally in-house on matte finish Siser ColourPrint PU, a vinyl that is CPSIA Certified for use on children's clothing.

APPLICATION INSTRUCTIONS

May be applied to:
  • 100% cotton
  • 100% polyester 
  • poly/cotton blends 
  • Lycra°/spandex 
  • Leather
Preheat the item you are applying the decal to for 2-3 Seconds 
Press for 15-20 seconds at 295° F/146° C  with a medium pressure and peel hot.
CARE INSTRUCTIONS
  • Do not dry clean
  • Machine wash WARM / mild detergent 
  • Dry on normal setting 
  • No chlorine bleach
  • Wait 24 hours before first wash
